function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate quarantine measures and lockdown implementation","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases, including COVID-19","Mitigation":"Implement stricter and more comprehensive quarantine measures, and enforce lockdowns effectively","Technologies":"Digital contact tracing, surveillance technology for monitoring quarantine compliance","People":"Resident population of Wuhan, medical staff, support personnel","Owner":"Local government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Insufficient medical beds and hospital isolation measures","Impact":"Overwhelmed healthcare system, increased transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Increase the number of medical beds, designate more hospitals for isolation, and strengthen medical infrastructure","Technologies":"Hospital management software, predictive modeling for resource allocation","People":"Patients, medical staff, local residents","Owner":"Healthcare authorities, hospital management"},{"Description":"Low proportion of people effectively wearing face masks","Impact":"Higher risk of transmission and spread of respiratory infections, including COVID-19","Mitigation":"Promote and enforce the use of face masks, distribute masks to the population, and educate on proper mask usage","Technologies":"Mask distribution tracking system, public awareness campaigns","People":"Population of Wuhan, medical staff, support personnel","Owner":"Public health authorities, local government"}]}
